thread.title: Prey SP - Altered Reality, episode 1: "Shrapnel City"

post.author: Altered Reality
post.body:
The first episode of my "episodic map pack" for Prey is available for download.

The goal is to create a singleplayer, interactivity-driven first-person story that will hopefully appeal to Prey fans and generally to 3DRealms fans, as well as portray some locations that differ from, and have a higher interactivity level than, the usual space stations levels.
The famous Portal Wrench mod (thank you Sars!) is included in this project, and sometimes, the only way to make progress will be to open some dynamic portals. Portals have a lot more potential than just being used as doorways, and I hope to unlock some of it.
The title is "Altered Reality" because that's what the story is about. A malevolent entity is slowly altering Tommy's reality, and the disruptions will become more and more severe as the story progresses.

The site for the project is http://alteredreality.altervista.org .
Here are some screenshots of what you will encounter in the first episode. They have been taken at a resolution of 800*600, at medium quality. Note that the in-game graphics are not censored in any way. The SRG logo is a watermark with my initials I applied to the screenshots, it's not present in game.
http://img264.imageshack.us/img264/4233/alleyje5.jpg
http://img136.imageshack.us/img136/2059/clubrl8.jpg
http://img515.imageshack.us/img515/2541/casinoxn6.jpg
http://img205.imageshack.us/img205/7734/highwayis8.jpg

You can download the first episode from:
http://alteredreality.altervista.org/ar_ep1_R2.zip
or
http://www.megaupload.com/?d=EY4DS4Q0
or
http://www.filecloud.com/files/file.php ... _id=612824
or
http://files.filefront.com/ar+ep1+R2zip ... einfo.html

Installation
Unzip the package into the directory where you have your Prey executable

EG
C:\Program Files\2K Games\Prey

Loading
- Once installed, run Prey.
- Click on "Mods" in the main menu.
- Load "Altered Reality".
- Bring down the console.
- Type: map shrapnelcity
- Press return. The map will load.

post.author: Altered Reality
post.body:
Bo$bevok wrote:
:shock: that was..... different

dude you need to get rid of the part on the radio when the guy is saying about liking little boys... thats just wrong.

I meant it to be disturbing. Think about it: an alien is trying to destroy Tommy's life, and he (the alien) will dare to do anything, ANYTHING, to turn Tommy's life into a living nightmare.
How would you react, if you heard someone speaking with YOUR voice on the radio, trying to pass as you, saying where you are in that very moment, and saying you did perverted things to little boys, while you know you did nothing of the sort? Think about the kind of emotion you'd feel. Panic, desperation, you'd think you're going crazy. That's exactly what I tried to convey.

Think about the kind of emotion you'd feel. Panic, desperation, you'd think you're going crazy. That's exactly what I tried to convey.
